pkgmetadata.longdescription: Fitting of Exponential Autoregressive Moving Average (EXPARMA) Model // The amplitude-dependent autoregressive time series model (EXPAR) proposed by Haggan and Ozaki (1981) doi:10.2307/2335819 was improved by incorporating the moving average (MA) framework for capturing the variability efficiently. Parameters of the EXPARMA model can be estimated using this package. The user is provided with the best fitted EXPARMA model for the data set under consideration.
